pyConnect
Class pyClient

java.lang.Object
  pyConnect.pyClient

public class pyClient
extends java.lang.Object

pyClient is the main class and used to connect to a python server.

Author:
arne.alder

connect

public boolean connect(java.lang.String sname,
                       java.lang.String spasswd)
Connecting to a xmlRPC Python Server at the given address as user.

Parameters:
Name - The name of user of the client.
Password - The password of the user of the client.
Returns:
The connection status. True if connected to the server.

Returns a server site defined user specific variable.

Parameters:
variablename - The name of the requested variable.
Returns:
The Varaible or an error from server.

ping

public java.lang.String ping(java.lang.String varname,
                             boolean global)
Returns a server site defined variable.

Parameters:
variablename - The name of the requested variable.
global - Defines if the variable is from global array (true) or user specific (false).
Returns:
The Varaible or an error from server.

resetPing

public void resetPing()
Reset the last requested global variable answer to "".

setChanged

public java.lang.String setChanged(java.lang.String varname,
                                   java.lang.String msg)
Setting an user specific ping message with a new content.

Parameters:
variablename - The name of the user specific ping message.
message - The ping message witch will showen by requesting the given name by ping.
Returns:
An answer or error from server.

message - The ping message witch will showen by requesting the given name by ping.
global - Defines if the ping message is from global array (true) or user specific (false).
